# CptWesley's Unofficial Guild Wars 2 Interactive Map
<a href="https://discord.gg/yhQ2Hnuc4f" target="_blank"><img src="https://img.shields.io/discord/1033792001226854410?&logo=discord&label=Discord&style=flat" alt="Discord" ></a>
<a href="https://www.buymeacoffee.com/cptwesley" target="_blank"><img src="https://shields.io/badge/Support%20Me-Buy%20Me%20A%20Coffee-yellow?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64," alt="Buy Me A Coffee" ></a>

Fan made interactive map for [Guild Wars 2](https://www.guildwars2.com/).
The interactive map can be accessed [here](https://cptwesley.github.io/Gw2InteractiveMap/).
It is currently not yet finished, but usable.
The source code is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/CptWesley/Gw2InteractiveMap).

### What is Guild Wars 2?
[Guild Wars 2](https://www.guildwars2.com/en/) is [ArenaNet](https://www.arena.net/en)'s succesful 2012 MMORPG published by [NCSoft](http://ncsoft.com/).
The game is currently _Free to Play_ through it's [website](https://account.arena.net/welcome) and through the [Steam store](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1284210/Guild_Wars_2/).
The game is still actively being maintained and new content is released on a periodic basis.
At the time of writing this, the latest expansion, [End of Dragons](https://www.guildwars2.com/en/end-of-dragons/), was released on the 28th of January 2022.

### Licensing
The source code of this project is available under the [MIT license](https://github.com/CptWesley/Gw2InteractiveMap/blob/master/LICENSE).

### Contribution
Any help is welcome. Feel free to open [issues or feature requests](https://github.com/CptWesley/Gw2InteractiveMap/issues) or create a [pull request](https://github.com/CptWesley/Gw2InteractiveMap/pulls).

### Support Me
Want to support me in other ways? You can [buy me a coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/cptwesley)! But don't feel obliged to!

### Disclaimer
Map tiles were obtained from the [Guild Wars 2 Wiki](https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/Tyria_(world)#Interactive_map).
All other assets and data was also obtained from the [Guild Wars 2 Wiki](https://wiki.guildwars2.com/), the [Guild Wars 2 API](https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/API:2) or gathered manually from the game.
All rights of the game assets and imagery used belong to [ArenaNet](https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/ArenaNet) or [NCSoft](https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/NCSoft).
Explicit permission for usage of these assets and imagery was **not** granted by either [ArenaNet](https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/ArenaNet) or [NCSoft](https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/NCSoft).
We believe our usage of these assets and imagery falls within the allowed [Content Terms Of Use](https://us.ncsoft.com/en-us/legal/ncsoft/content-terms-of-use).
